Nighlight/Scientis:

"Why always this have to happen when I use a cr...?" s=
he whispered

"A lot factions is here in Earth, Let's see: Iron Skull Preda=
cons leaded by the stubborn and closed mind Jotunn;the frivolous and in my =
opinion, treacherous Lady Spire lead Bushido Predacons; The kind and glente=
 Pacificus Maximals whose leaders is the respected Lord Perseus and the ext=
reme and predacon-hate leader of Siloverwings, Lord razorwing... As soon as=
 we arrived this planet, we were divided and we not trusted each other"The =
scientis sighed"To be honest, only watcher could prevent that Unicroniands =
destroy us...but, as I said you have alot things to chat and I have to work=
 too.. Let's see what can I do to find the child... and you well, if you ha=
ve to remaind here you should start to meet the place"
